alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued November 25 at 3:59AM HST until November 26 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND... .Surf along exposed north and west facing shores will gradually lower through the weekend as a significant northwest swell moves through. Heights should dip below the advisory levels by Monday. ...HIGH SURF WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Surf of 20 to 30 feet for north facing shores. Surf of 18 to 22 feet for west facing shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Surf will steadily lower through the weekend, likely dropping below warning level by early Sunday morning, then below advisory levels by Monday. * IMPACTS...High...Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.
